name: two avoids
description:
Our submission for the 2018 ShenaniJam using the theme "Void Sandwich".

Scientists at Cern hit the wrong key on their jet black keyboard and accidentally created two black holes near the planet Earth. Whoops! Mass evacuations take place as the black holes rapidly grow and threaten to make a void sandwich with Earth peanut butter. Help the escape rockets to safety through a nearby wormhole. Dodge the space debris and avoid the gravitational pull of the black holes to make it to the wormhole. How many ships can you save?

Controls:  W - propel rockets, A - yaw left, D - yaw right, SPACE BAR - force launch

Note: all ships are controlled simultaneously.

                     avoid this          and this!                    go here!

Pro tip: hold space bar for rapid launching!

Producers -  Michael Gailey and Andrew Collins
Fonts - Printed circuit board by JLH Fonts and  Mainframe by Disaster Fonts
Music -  "Is that you or are you you?" and "The Life and Death of a Certain K. Zabriskie, Patriarch" by Chris Zabriskie http://chriszabriskie.com/  

Tools used:

-Unity - https://unity3d.com/

--DOTween - http://dotween.demigiant.com/

-Inkscape - https://inkscape.org/en/

-bfxr - https://www.bfxr.net/

-Apple iMovie - https://www.apple.com/imovie/

-Xsplit - https://www.xsplit.com/

-Audacity - https://www.audacityteam.org/
